Cancer has also spread to any of the following:            - The nasal cavity.     - The ethmoid sinus.     - The eye socket.     - The maxillary sinus.     - The roof of the mouth.     - The bone between the eyes.              Stage IV     Stage IV is divided into stage IVA, IVB, and IVC.         Stage IVA      In stage IVA, cancer has spread:               - to one lymph node on the same side
